metadata.title: CVE-2024-46804 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Add array index check for hdcp ddc access[Why]Coverity reports OVERRUN warning. Do not check if arrayindex valid.[How]Check msg_id valid and valid array index.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
